title: The Brecker Brothers - Back To Back (1976) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
01. Keep It Steady (Brecker Bump) [06:24]
02. If You Wanna Boogie...Forget It [03:58]
03. Lovely Lady [06:17]
04. Night Flight [06:17]
05. Slick Stuff [04:48]
06. Dig A Little Deeper [04:00]
07. Grease Peace [05:47]
08. What Can A Miracle Do [04:16]
09. I Love Wastin' Time With You [06:31]
10. If You Wanna Boogie...Forget It (Single Version) [Bonus Track] [03:11]
11. Slick Stuff (Single Version) [Bonus Track] [03:54]


Randy Brecker - trumpet, electric trumpet, flugelhorn
Michael Brecker - tenor saxophone, flute
Dave Sanborn - alto saxophone
Don Grolnick - keyboards
Steve Khan - guitar
Will Lee - electric bass, lead vocals
Christopher Parker - drums
Steve Gadd - drums (#4,9)
Ralph MacDonald - percussion
Sammy Figueroa, Rafael Cruz - percussion (#4)
Lew Del Gatto - baritone saxophone (#2)
Dave Friedman - marimba (#6)
Dave Whitman - synthesizer programmer
Patti Austin, Luther Vandross. Robin Clark, Diane Sumler - vocals
